basic_info.headline: Senior Product Manager — PLG & Onboarding | Experiments, Activation, Analytics
basic_info.location: San Francisco Bay Area, CA, US

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
description: Overhauled self-serve onboarding; Week‑2 activation +22% and trial→paid +11% across SMB.
Built experimentation cadence (weekly triage, monthly reviews); 30+ tests/year.
Defined analytics taxonomy and dashboards adopted by PMM/CS for lifecycle targeting.

experience.title: Product Manager
description: Owned notifications platform; churn −3.5% via usage-triggered lifecycle messaging.
Launched persona playbooks; engagement +8% and feature adoption +6%.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
description: Delivered admin console; NPS +10 in two quarters; support tickets −18%.
Instituted experiment backlog and readouts to align Eng/Design/CS.

projects.name: Experimentation Hub
projects.description: Internal tooling for test design and readouts across squads.
